Pundmann Ford - Summit White 2023 Chevrolet Silverado 2500HD LT 4WD 10-Speed Automatic Duramax 6.6L V8 Turbodiesel Only at Pundmann Ford!! [hidden information], 10-Speed Automatic, 4WD, Black Leather, 10-Way Power Driver Seat Adjuster w/Lumbar, 12-Volt Rear Auxiliary Power Outlet, 120-Volt Bed Mounted Power Outlet, 120-Volt Instrument Panel Power Outlet, 2 USB Ports & 1 SD Card Reader (1st Row), 6-Speaker Audio System, Advanced Trailering System, All Star Edition, Black Chevytec Spray-On Bedliner, Cloth Rear Seat w/Storage Package, Convenience Package, Convenience Package II, Dual Charge-Only USB Ports (2nd Row), Dual-Zone Automatic Climate Control, Electric Rear-Window Defogger, Electrical Lock Control Steering Column, Front 40/20/40 Split-Bench Seats w/Lockable Storage, Front LED Fog Lamps, Gooseneck/5th Wheel Package, HD Rear Vision Camera, Heated Driver & Front Outboard Passenger Seating, Heated Steering Wheel, Heavy Duty Front Spring/Camper Package, Hitch Guidance w/Hitch View, Keyless Open & Start, Lane Change Alert w/Side Blind Zone Alert, LED Cargo Area Lighting, Manual Tilt & Telescoping Steering Column, Power Sliding Rear Window w/Defogger, Radio: Chevrolet Infotainment 3 Plus System, Rear Cross Traffic Alert, Rear Wheelhouse Liners, Remote Vehicle Starter System, Safety Package, SiriusXM w/360L, Ultrasonic Front & Rear Park Assist, Unauthorized Entry Theft-Deterrent System, Universal Home Remote, Wireless Phone Projection.
Only at Pundmann Ford in St Charles!! [hidden information].

Options : 4-Wheel Disc Brakes. 8 Cylinder Engine. A/C. ABS. Adjustable Steering Wheel. Aluminum Wheels. AM/FM Stereo. Auxiliary Audio Input. Back-Up Camera. Bluetooth Connection. Cloth Seats. Conventional Spare Tire. Cruise Control. Daytime Running Lights. Diesel Fuel. Driver Air Bag. Driver Restriction Features. Floor Mats. Four Wheel Drive. Front Head Air Bag. Front Side Air Bag. Heated Mirrors. Integrated Turn Signal Mirrors. Keyless Entry. Locking/Limited Slip Differential. MP3 Capability. Pass-Through Rear Seat. Passenger Air Bag. Passenger Air Bag On/Off Switch. Passenger Air Bag Sensor. Power Door Locks. Power Mirror. Power Outlet. Power Steering. Power Windows. Privacy Glass. Rear Bench Seat. Rear Head Air Bag. Requires Subscription. Satellite Radio. Smart Device Integration. Split Bench Seat. Stability Control. Steering Wheel Audio Controls. Telematics. Tire Pressure Monitor. Tires - Front All-Season. Tires - Rear All-Season. Tow Hitch. Tow Hooks. Traction Control. Turbocharged. WiFi Hotspot See less
